member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3
member.summary: The ENHMETAHEADER3 structure contains enhanced-metafile data including the dimensions of the metafile image, the number of records in the metafile, and the resolution of the device on which the metafile was created.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.iType
member.summary: Record type. Value is always EMR_HEADER.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nSize
member.summary: Structure size, in bytes. This may be greater than the value returned by sizeof(ENHMETAHEADER3).

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.rclBounds
member.summary: Bounding rectangle, in device units, for the image stored in the metafile.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.rclFrame
member.summary: Rectangle, in 0.01 millimeter units, that surrounds the image stored in the metafile.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nVersion
member.summary: Version number of the metafile format. The current version is 0x10000.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nBytes
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the metafile.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nRecords
member.summary: Number of records in the metafile.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nHandles
member.summary: Number of handles in the metafile handle table. Handle index zero is reserved.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nDescription
member.summary: Number of characters in the string that contains the description of the metafile's contents. This member is 0 if the metafile does not have a description string.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.offDescription
member.summary: Offset from the beginning of the ENHMETAHEADER3 structure to the string that contains the description of the metafile's contents. This member is 0 if the metafile does not have a description string.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.nPalEntries
member.summary: Number of entries in the metafile palette.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.szlDevice
member.summary: Resolution, in pixels, of the reference device.

member.name: ENHMETAHEADER3.szlMillimeters
member.summary: Resolution, in millimeters, of the reference device.
